column2: Karelia has been a fundamental part of the Russian Empire ever since it was taken from the Swedes in 1590. The Norwegians may have stolen it from us about a hundred years ago but we now have the strength to reclaim our rightful land.

Hungary has long been considered a core element of the Austrian state and it was taken from us in a cruel succession war. This new age demands that we stake our claim on this fair land and return it to its rightful owner.
With the dawn of a new century, it is time for us to colonise the innermost regions of our continent.
With the dawn of a new century, it is time for us to colonise the northernmost regions of our continent.
With the dawn of a new century, it is time for us to colonise the innermost regions of our domain.
With the dawn of a new century, it is time for us to colonise the northernmost regions of our continent.
